verses.verse: <S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H6481>one<s%> who is <S%H1795>emasculated,<s%> <S%H6481><s%> or has his <S%H8212>male<s%> <S%H8212>organ<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off,<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H4464>one<s%> of <S%H4464>illegitimate<s%> <S%H4464>birth<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of his [descendants,] <S%H1571>even<s%> to the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> generation, shall <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> or <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of their [descendants,] <S%H1571>even<s%> to the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> generation, shall <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

<S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> they did not <S%H6923>meet<s%> you with <S%H3899>food<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> on the <S%H1870>way<s%> when you <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> from <S%H6604>Pethor<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia,<s%> to <S%H7043>curse<s%> you.

"Nevertheless, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> was not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H7045>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> for you <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> you.
"You shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> or their <S%H9186>prosperity<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H8581>detest<s%> an <S%H130>Edomite,<s%> for he is your <S%H251>brother;<s%> you shall not <S%H8581>detest<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you were an <S%H1616>alien<s%> in his <S%H776>land.<s%>
"The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> generation <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H3205>born<s%> to them may <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H3318>go<s%> out as an <S%H4264>army<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H340>enemies,<s%> then you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> yourself from <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> there is among you <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H3808>unclean<s%> <S%H2889><s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of a <S%H3915>nocturnal<s%> <S%H7137>emission,<s%> then he must <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> he may not <S%H935>reenter<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

"But it shall be when <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H6437>approaches,<s%> he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and at <S%H8121>sundown<s%> <S%H935><s%> he may <S%H935>reenter<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
"You shall also <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3027>place<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H8033>there,<s%>

and you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3489>spade<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> your <S%H240>tools,<s%> and it shall be when you <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> you shall <S%H2658>dig<s%> with it and shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> up your <S%H6627>excrement.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Since<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of your <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you and to <S%H5414>defeat<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, therefore your <S%H4264>camp<s%> must be <S%H6918>holy;<s%> and He must not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1697>anything<s%> <S%H6172>indecent<s%> among you lest He <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from you.
"You shall not <S%H5462>hand<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> to his <S%H113>master<s%> a <S%H5650>slave<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H5337>escaped<s%> from his <S%H113>master<s%> to you.

"He shall <S%H3427>live<s%> with you in your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H8179>towns<s%> where it <S%H2896>pleases<s%> him; you shall not <S%H3238>mistreat<s%> him.

<S%H3808>"None<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be a <S%H6945>cult<s%> <S%H6945>prostitute,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall <S%H4480>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be a <S%H6945>cult<s%> <S%H6945>prostitute.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H868>hire<s%> of a <S%H2181>harlot<s%> or the <S%H4242>wages<s%> of a <S%H3611>dog<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5088>votive<s%> <S%H5088>offering,<s%> for <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> of these are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H9348>charge<s%> <S%H9348>interest<s%> to your <S%H251>countrymen:<s%> <S%H5392>interest<s%> on <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H400>food,<s%> [or] <S%H3605>anything<s%> that may be <S%H9348>loaned<s%> at <S%H9348>interest.<s%>

"You may <S%H9348>charge<s%> <S%H9348>interest<s%> to a <S%H5237>foreigner,<s%> but to your <S%H251>countryman<s%> you shall not <S%H9348>charge<s%> <S%H9348>interest,<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H3027>undertake<s%> <S%H9303><s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you are about to <S%H935>enter<s%> to <S%H3423>possess.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H5087>make<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> you shall not <S%H309>delay<s%> to <S%H9608>pay<s%> it, for it would be <S%H2399>sin<s%> in you, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1875>surely<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> it of you.
"However, <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H2308>refrain<s%> from <S%H5087>vowing,<s%> it would not be <S%H2399>sin<s%> in you.

"You shall be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H4161>what<s%> <S%H4161>goes<s%> out from your <S%H8193>lips,<s%> <S%H3152>just<s%> as you have <S%H5071>voluntarily<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> you have <S%H1696>promised.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> your neighbor's <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> then you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%> until you are <S%H7648>fully<s%> <S%H7648>satisfied,<s%> but you shall not <S%H5414>put<s%> any in your <S%H3627>basket.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> your neighbor's <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>grain,<s%> then you may <S%H6998>pluck<s%> the <S%H4425>heads<s%> with your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but you shall not <S%H5130>wield<s%> a <S%H2770>sickle<s%> in your neighbor's <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>grain.<s%>
